content: these little cute colored granny squares can be worn in the ears a simple pattern a couple of hours of time and you can try on new earrings i made this earrings of cotton yarn you can use any yarn to your taste you ll find the written pattern and some helpful photos skill level easy + materials ★ crochet hook should be taken number less than recommended for your yarn crochet should be tightly so that the granny squares was the form ★ small amount of yarn ★ starch or school glue or pva glue for stiffening your crochet motifs ★ metal rings and clasps for earrings and pliers
